name: Шампунь Syoss Volume с экстрактом фиолетового риса для тонких волос 0.45л
ingredients: Aqua, sodium laureth sulfate, cocamidopropyl betaine, peg-7 glyceryl cocoate, sodium chloride, hydrolyzed collagen, panthenol, hydrolyzed keratin, disodium cocoamphodiacetate, cocamide mea, glycol distearate, citric acid, sodium benzoate, laureth-4, peg-40 hydrogenated castor oil, parfum, hydrogenated castor oil, propylene glycol, peg-120 methyl glucose dioleate, polyquaternium-10, hexyl cinnamal, butylphenyl methylpropional, benzyl salicylate, linalool, glycerin, sorbitol, benzyl alcohol, limonene, nymphaea alba root extract.
